name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, **Postgres**, and **CI/CD**. Proven track record in frontend and backend development, adept at building scalable solutions and optimizing performance in complex environments.
Skilled in **GraphQL** for efficient data-fetching and proficient in database management with **Postgres** and **Redis**. Experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams, leveraging strong communication and collaboration skills for effective product management and user research.
Successfully developed and deployed AI/ML-powered platforms, implementing microservices and event-driven architectures. Well-versed in compliance-driven development aligned with industry standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Demonstrated MLOps skills with frameworks like MLflow and Airflow, ensuring streamlined workflows and continuous integration.

• Designed GraphQL APIs to enhance data interactions with PostgreSQL for efficient data retrieval and management, supporting complex queries from the client-side.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing tools such as **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**, ensuring automated testing and seamless deployments across environments, reducing deployment time by **30%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, leveraging strong communication and collaboration skills to translate user research insights into technical solutions and prototypes.
• Prioritized and managed product features effectively, ensuring alignment with business objectives and user needs, while adhering to agile project management methodologies.
• Conducted user research to inform the development process, enhancing user satisfaction by implementing feedback-driven design improvements.
• Created and maintained Redis for caching strategies, resulting in a **50%** performance improvement in data retrieval times.
• Actively participated in prototyping sessions to iterate on product features reflecting user-centered design principles, expediting the development lifecycle.
• Led workshops and presentations to communicate project statuses and technical challenges, enhancing team collaboration and stakeholder engagement.

• Developed scalable front-end applications using **TypeScript**, **React (18)**, and **Next.js**, ensuring high performance and responsive design for user interfaces in financial tools.
• Enhanced back-end services by leveraging **Node.js** and **Postgres** for reliable data management and efficient processing in financial applications.
• Implemented **CI/CD** practices to streamline deployment processes, facilitating quicker product iterations and improving delivery timelines by **30%**.
• Collaborated closely with product management and user research teams to gather requirements and feedback, fostering a user-centric approach in **prototyping** new features for financial services.
• Conducted comprehensive user research, leading to the development of user-friendly interfaces which enhanced user engagement metrics by **25%**.
• Utilized **Redis** for caching mechanisms to significantly improve data retrieval times, resulting in a **20%** reduction in load times for dynamic web applications.
• Established effective communication channels within cross-functional teams to ensure project alignment and increase collaboration efficiency, resulting in improved team productivity by **15%**.
• Designed and implemented real-time analytics using **GraphQL** for data querying, enabling users to access critical financial insights on demand.
